definition: to claim (as one's property)/to adopt (a child)/to accept (an illegitimate child as one's own)
to recognize/to know/to admit
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
lost and found

sentences.english: I claimed my lost luggage at the Lost and Found.
sentences.chinese: 我在失物招领处认领了丢失的行李。

sentences.english: She possessed herself of the unclaimed goods.
sentences.chinese: 她把那些没人认领的货物占为己有。

sentences.english: Pull a brief informal note to be his paste the enlightenment that find a person, before long somebody claim ladle.
sentences.chinese: 拉条子为他张贴了寻人启示，不久有人认领了勺子。

sentences.english: We choose to go to the moon and other things, not because they are easy, but because they are hard.
sentences.chinese: 好容易翻完这么长这么专业的东西居然没人认领？

sentences.english: Your claim check is stapled in the back of your ticket jacket .
sentences.chinese: 你的认领单钉在票封的背面。

sentences.english: Unclaimed bodies of the victims, such as rehabilitation work is under way.
sentences.chinese: 遇难者遗体认领等善后工作也正在展开。

sentences.english: Illegitimate child claim system is an important system of the family law.
sentences.chinese: 非婚生子女认领制度是亲属法上的一项重要制度。

sentences.english: So do the corpses in the streets and the ones waiting for identification in the morgue.
sentences.chinese: 还有那些街上的尸体，那些在太平间等着认领的陈尸。

sentences.english: Father is not known and mother is foreigner.
sentences.chinese: 父无可考或生父未认领，母为外国人者。

sentences.english: Bob: Yes, I have. But no one comes to claim her.
sentences.chinese: 试过了，但是没人来认领她。

sentences.english: The hotel reserves the right to dispose of any item which is not claimed within this period of time.
sentences.chinese: 在上述期限内无人认领的物品，酒店有权自行处理。

sentences.english: Unclaimed items are donated to charity.
sentences.chinese: 无人认领的被捐赠给慈善机构。

sentences.english: One explanation for hunting birds' phenomenal eyesight is the sheer size of the retina.
sentences.chinese: 一种对认领鹰的视力的解释是它的视网膜尺寸的大小。

sentences.english: I claimed the my lost luggage at the Lost and Found.
sentences.chinese: 我在失物招领处认领了丢失的行李。

sentences.english: Japan annexed what it says were unclaimed islands in 1895.
sentences.chinese: 日本于1895年吞并了其所谓的无人认领的岛屿。

definition: owner of sth lost or stolen
to advertise for the owner of lost property
to find/to pick up/to obtain
to sponsor/to adopt (pledge to give sb or sth one's special attention or support)/to adopt (choose to raise a child or animal as one's own)
lost and found
lost-and-found
to drag away
to receive/to draw/to get
adoption/to adopt (a child)
lost/missing/to lose (sb in one's charge)/to get lost/to wander away/to lose (flavor, freshness, shape, hair, one's good looks etc)/to lose meaning (in translation)
to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
to lead (sb, or an animal) away/to collect (e.g. a child left in sb's care beforehand)/to take away
to report a case to the authorities
to verify/to check
to send/to deliver/to distribute
report the loss to the authorities concerned
